about_the_game:
ELDRIMAR: The Card Game is a card-based roguelike where you take on the role of the warlord Saron and participate in all significant battles for the kingdom of Eldrimar.

The game combines CCG (Collectible Card Game) and roguelike mechanics. Build decks from various cards, defeat enemies, use artifacts to enhance your abilities, and create new cards.

Furthermore, the game features a storyline that narrates the entire history of the kingdom of Eldrimar, its rises, and falls. The story will span across centuries, allowing you to play as Alira, who becomes a demon, and as a demon turned vampire conquering the whole world. Discover how he managed to conquer the kingdom of Eldrimar!
